overview_of_class: This is part 2 of a 3 quarter sequence on the theory and phenomenology of condensed matter physics. The course will cover the physics of electrons in metallic, insulating, and semiconducting materials. Concrete topics in the second quarter will include band theory, Landau Fermi-Liquids, electron transport, effects of disorder, optical properties of metals, electron transport in magnetic fields and de Haas-van Alphen / de Haas-Shubnikov oscillations
name: Condensed-Matter Physics
subject: PHYSICS
